title: Biden Admin Sees Bipartisan Infrastructure Bill As A Win
description: After months of bipartisan negotiation, the Senate may finally vote this weekend on a 2,700 page infrastructure bill that includes $1 trillion in spending on things like roads, bridges, public transit, and broadband.

itunes:title: Biden Admin Sees Bipartisan Infrastructure Bill As A Win
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: After months of negotiations, the Senate may finally vote on a $1 trillion infrastructure bill this weekend.
